alert.note: Alert for Bath; Fleming; Menifee; Morgan; Powell; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 6:25PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Powell, northwestern Morgan, Bath, Menifee, Fleming and Rowan Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 624 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Craintown to near Pebble to Odessa to Preston to Rothwell to Nada. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Flemingsburg, Oakley, Pebble, Wyoming, Grange City, Odessa, Tilton and Craintown around 630 PM EDT. Salt Lick, Polksville, Hillsboro and Poplar Plains around 635 PM EDT. Moore`s Ferry, Mount Carmel, Wallingford, Foxport, Young Springs, Midland, Ringos Mills and Farmers around 640 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Yale, Goddard, Ramey, Zilpo, Plummers Landing, Scranton, Sharkey, Cogswell, Hilda, Muses Mills, Dan, Bluestone, Freestone, Big Woods, Brandy, Hays Crossing, Munson, Morehead, Bangor, Crix, Paragon, Clearfield, Cranston, Rodburn, Christy, Waltz, Lick Fork, Craney, Triplett, Gates and Leisure. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bath; Fleming; Menifee; Morgan; Powell; Rowan
